gui_text.session_text:
Select course sessions for Scorecard creation.
Every row selected will create one Scorecard PDF, with a full page of summary information about the course.
When finished selecting all desired course sessions, press Confirm.
gui_text.course_text:
Select courses for Course History Graph creation.
Every row selected will create one Course History Graph PNG image, with a GPA over time for all course sessions, 
grouped by instructor.
When finished selecting all desired courses, press Confirm.
gui_text.instructor_text:
Select instructors for Instructor Scorecard creation.
Every row selected will create one Instructor Scorecard PDF, with a short summary of key information about every course from 
the instructor on file.
When finished selecting all desired instructors, press Confirm.
